descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jayson Tatum uses a step-back move to free himself from the defender and manages to knock down a 3-pointer that bounces around and in.
videos.headline: Tatum bounces in step-back 3-pointer

videos.description: Brandon Boston Jr. gets the last second pass from Marcus Morris Sr. and quickly does a turnaround move to knock down a wild buzzer-beating 3-pointer in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brandon Boston Jr. knocks down turnaround buzzer-beating 3) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brandon Boston Jr. knocks down turnaround buzzer-beating 3

videos.description: Jayson Tatum lets out a furious yell at the Clippers crowd after throwing down a powerful one-handed dunk on the fast break.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum gets amped after fast-break throwdown) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum gets amped after fast-break throwdown
